SEARCH
Package hms.manager

Class UserManager

Object
UserManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IManager
public class UserManager extends Object implements IManager
The UserManager class manages the all users in the system. It provides methods to authenticate users, check if a user exists, and get the repository of a user type

    • UserManager

      public UserManager(ManagerContext ctx, String patientRepoFilepath, String doctorRepoFilepath, String pharmacistRepoFilepath, String adminRepoFilepath)
      Constructor for the UserManager.
      Parameters:
      ctx - The ManagerContext.
      patientRepoFilepath - The file path to the patient repository.
      doctorRepoFilepath - The file path to the doctor repository.
      pharmacistRepoFilepath - The file path to the pharmacist repository.
      adminRepoFilepath - The file path to the admin repository.

  • Method Details

    • authenticate

      public Class<? extends User> authenticate(String id, String password)
      Authenticates a user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      The user class if the authentication is successful, null otherwise.

      Checks if a user exists.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Get a list of user that satisfies a list of criteria
      Parameters:
      userClass - Type of user we need to find
      criteria - The search criteria
      Returns:
